name: CHAOS 1.0 - Opera [ALPHA]
description: CHAOS for Opera Browser! (2D Transforms only!) Looking for style 71744? Looking for style 71745? Included in BPM! Be sure to check these out: BetterPonymotes style 71744 style 71745 style 78282 style 65166 style 71743 style 77556 style 52899
additional_info: In use examples! ## CHANGELOG ## ==2112.11.12 -Created style 78282 -Reorganized everything and added missing ' -Changed -nips, -znips, -edils, & -tfish to -!spin, -!zspin, -!slide, & -!shift respectively. -Replaced animation speed flags with -s# where # represents seconds between 1 and 15 ==2012.11.02 -Added new flags -slide, -shift, -edils, & -tfish -Added animation speed flags -fastest, -faster, -fast, -slow, -slower, & -slowest
